0: assert could_be("Carlos Ray Norris", "Carlos Ray Norris") == True
assert could_be("Carlos Ray Norris", "Carlos Ray") == True
assert could_be("Carlos Ray Norris", "Norris Carlos") == True
2: assert could_be("First Middle Last", "Last First Middle") == True
assert could_be("John Paul Smith", "Paul Smith") == True
assert could_be("John Paul Smith", "P Smith") == True
assert could_be("A B C D", "A B") == True
3: assert could_be("John Peter Smith", "Smith John") == True
assert could_be("John Peter Smith", "John-Smith Peter") == False
assert could_be("Alice Bob Charlie", "Alice Charlie") == True
assert could_be("Martin Luther King", "Luther King Jr.") == False
assert could_be("Michael J. Fox", "Fox Michael") == False
